room_title: Escape room "Zoe" by Escaped Las Vegas: ZOE in Las Vegas
room_address: 3645 S Las Vegas Blvd #221 Las Vegas, NV 89109
room_description:
There is one scene in your mind that is busily following you. It has initially appeared in your dreams, the scene of an abandoned house, but it has started chasing you during the daytime. This house seems to be calling for you, it attracts you with an unknown force...
What’s wrong with it? Is there anyone living there? Does he or she need help? You cannot survive it any longer, it’s driving you crazy...You start surfing and accidentally you find the needed location…
